products.title: Light Grey (1705) (Blackout)
products.description: The velux blackout blind offers light proof seal for total darkness anytime. It is ideal in bedrooms, where you need complete light control to ensure a good nights sleep or restful nap during the day. Total blackout - best on the market. Oeko-tex certified. Stepless positioning. Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window. Available in 24 colours. Installs in minutes. Buy made to measure light grey (1705) (blackout) velux blackout roller blinds from soeasy blinds.

products.title: Infinite Grey (1262)
products.description: The velux pleated blind is an elegant way to provide privacy while bathing your room in a pleasant , soft light.
